mapper.select: select distinct m.id,m.parent_id,m.name,m.type,m.path,m.component,m.perms,m.icon,m.sort_value,m.status,m.create_time,m.update_time,m.is_deleted from `wmy-oa`.sys_menu m inner join `wmy-oa`.sys_role_menu rm on rm.menu_id = m.id inner join `wmy-oa`.sys_user_role sur on sur.role_id = rm.role_id where sur.user_id = #{userId} and m.status = 1 and rm.is_deleted = 0 and sur.is_deleted = 0 and m.is_deleted = 0
